sect1.title: SIZEOF
sect1.para:
SIZEOF SIZEOF
SIZEOF function (data [, MAX MAX ] )

row.entry: The name of a dataset, RECORD structure, a fully-qualified field name, or a constant string expression.
Specifies the data is variable-length (such as containing child datasets) and the value to return is the maximum size..
SIZEOF returns a single integer value.

sect1.para: The SIZEOF function returns the total number of bytes defined for storage of the specified data structure or field.
